entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
